channel.title: Raj Kumar Manna
channel.description: Recent content on Raj Kumar Manna

item.title: _index
item.description:
I am currently a graduate student working with Prof. P B Sunil Kumar and Prof. Ronojoy Adhikari in the Department of Physics at Indian Institute of Technology Madras. Before joining as a research scholar, I did my master degree (M.Sc) in Physics from Department of Physics, IIT Madras and Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in Physics from Ramakrishna Mission Residential College, Narendrapur, affiliated to University of Calcutta.


My research interests are in the area of non-equilibrium soft condensed matter and biological physics. I use computer simulations to study the complex structures and dynamics of these systems

item.description:

Contact

HSB-234

Complex Fuilds and Biological Physics Lab

Department of Physics

Indian Institute of Technology Madras

Chennai, India

Pin. 600036

Resume

Raj Kumar Manna

  • Contact Information:

           Complex Fluids & Biological Physics Lab

           Department of Physics

           Indian Institute of Technology Madras

           Chennai, India - 600 036

           Phone: +91-44-2257-5854

           E-mail: raj@physics.itm.ac.in

  • Present Position:

           Graduate Student (2011 - )

           Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai, India.

           Research Topics:

           Collcetive dynamics of active filaments.

           Thesis Advisor: Prof. P. B. Sunil Kumar, Prof. Ronojoy Adhikari.

  • Education:

           M.Sc., Physics (2009 - 2011)

           Department of Physics

           Indian Institute of Technology Madras

           Chennai, India.

           (CGPA 8.35 in a 10 point scale)

           B.Sc., Physics, (2006 - 2009)

           Ramakrishna Mission Residential College, Narendrapur

           Affiliated to University of Calcutta, India

           First Class (67.5%)

  • Academic Interests:
    • Soft Matter Physics
    • Biological Physics
    • Nonlinear Dynamics
